divs: Sighting DetailsNoticed flashing colors behind the house as we were walking up the driveway walked to te back yard to see an object with flashing lights in the distance. Watched the object for 40 minutes as it moved slowley from right to left. At times it seemed to have a line of the lights on either side of oe main bright light in the center. We watched several planes pass over this object and it slowly moved away from our area as if it was turning around to head in another direction. There was no sound coming from this object and a friend came to te house to witness this object. We were all surprised at what we were looking at and amazed at the same time.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Mayfield
There were no other sightings in Mayfield on or around April 13th 2011
Summary: multiple colors of light flashing( green, purple,orange, blue, red) with object hovering moving slowly at times
